sentences.english: One of the Croft movie’s filming locations was Cambodia.
sentences.chinese: 《古墓麗影》的拍攝場地之一是柬埔寨。

sentences.english: Many exquisite funerary objects were extracted from this grave.
sentences.chinese: 這個古墓裏出土了很多精美的隨葬品。

sentences.english: Legend, Dayu flood control when, where ancient tombs found in disk.
sentences.chinese: 傳說，大禹治水的時候，在這裏發現了盤古墓。

sentences.english: An archaeologically valuable ancient tomb was unearthed in the underlying soil of this corn field.
sentences.chinese: 這片玉米地下伏土層中出土了一個有考古價值的古墓。

sentences.english: An ancient tomb was discovered at Qunxing precinct in Zhangshi of Qujiang County.
sentences.chinese: 曲江樟市鎮羣星管理區發現一座古墓。

sentences.english: Eustacia's final tragedy is forecasted by the barrow image.
sentences.chinese: 遊苔莎最終的悲劇由古墓意象預示出來。

sentences.english: How long does it take for a typical filming day for Rise of the Tomb Raider?
sentences.chinese: 一般來說每天拍攝古墓麗影會花多長時間？

sentences.english: I would definitely be unable to traverse tomb walls Ninja Warrior style like Lara, though.
sentences.chinese: 我自然不可能像勞拉一樣以忍者的方式遍歷古墓。

sentences.english: There are also many famous ancient cities, with many ancient tombs and artifacts being found.
sentences.chinese: 在達茂旗境內還保存着許多的古墓以及各種文物等。

sentences.english: It is the key to accurate grasp the characteristics of style and skill in studying Gaogouli s murals of ancient graves.
sentences.chinese: 研究高句麗古墓壁畫，準確把握其風格技法是關鍵。

sentences.english: All you needed was the location of Qualopec's Tomb.
sentences.chinese: 你們所需要的，就是誇洛佩克古墓的位置。

sentences.english: Keats sleeps in an old cemetery in Rome.
sentences.chinese: 濟慈被埋葬於羅馬的一處古墓園。

sentences.english: The Tombs of Atuan was a Newbery Honor Book in 1972.
sentences.chinese: 地海古墓是1972年紐伯利兒童文學銀獎作品。

sentences.english: Therefore, the scientific analysis of the safety of the tomb became an inevitable necessity.
sentences.chinese: 因此對古墓安全的科學分析成爲一種必然。

sentences.english: How do you store or display all of your Tomb Raider goods?
sentences.chinese: 這麼多古墓麗影的產品，您平時都放在哪？

definition: underground palace (as part of imperial tomb)
the tomb of the First Emperor at Mt Li 驪山|骊山[Li2 shan1] near Xi'an (awaits excavation)
the tomb of the first emperor at Mt Li 驪山|骊山[Li2 shan1] near Xi'an (awaits excavation)
funerary objects (items buried together with the dead)
path leading to a grave/tomb passage/aisle leading to the coffin chamber of an ancient tomb
